meanings.definition: A sound system that uses four separate channels to create a more immersive audio experience.
meanings.sent1: The quadraphonics in the movie theater made it feel like the sound was all around me.
meanings.sent2: I love listening to music in quadraphonics because it feels like the instruments are right next to me.
meanings.sent3: The quadraphonics at the concert were so clear, I could hear the singer's every breath!
meanings.sent4: Her laughter filled the room like quadraphonics, echoing off the walls.
meanings.sent5: The quadraphonics at the theme park made the roller coaster ride even more thrilling.

meanings.definition: The technology or technique of producing or reproducing sound in quadraphonic format.
meanings.sent1: The studio used quadraphonics to mix the audio for the movie.
meanings.sent2: Quadraphonics has revolutionized the way we experience music.
meanings.sent3: The quadraphonics equipment malfunctioned, causing the sound to come out distorted.
meanings.sent4: His voice filled the room with quadraphonics, captivating everyone who listened.
meanings.sent5: The concert hall was filled with the rich quadraphonics of the orchestra, transporting the audience to another world.
